    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Kan du det här? 2</string>
            <string language="en">Can you do this? 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Können Sie dies tun? 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pouvez-vous faire ceci ? 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pode você fazer este? 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potete fare questo? 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορείτε να κάνετε αυτό; 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Puede usted hacer esto? 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här finns dels en möjlighet till självutvärdering mot målen för Modul 2, dels ett litet självrättande test som prövar kursdeltagaren på innehållet i hela Modul 2, Vad kostar det?Modul 2 - Vad kostar det?Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here are partly an opportunity for self-evaluation against the objectives of Module 2, and a little self-correction test hearing participants on the contents of the Module 2, What does it cost? Module 2 - What does it cost? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">test</string>
            <string language="sv">utvärdering</string>
            <string language="sv">egen bedömning</string>
            <string language="sv">mål</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">test</string>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
            <string language="en">own assessment</string>
            <string language="en">target</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier teils sind eine Gelegenheit für 
Self-evaluation gegen die Lernziele von Modul 2 und eine kleine 
Selbst-Korrektur Testhörfähigkeit Teilnehmer auf dem Inhalt des 
Moduls 2, was es kostet? Modul 2 - Was kostet es? 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Est-ce que voici en partie une occasion pour 
art de l'auto-portrait-evaluation contre les objectifs du module 2, et les petits 
participants d'une audition d'essai de art de l'auto-portrait-correction sur le 
contenu du module 2, qu'il coûte ? Module 2 - Que 
coûte-t-il ? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estão aqui em parte uma oportunidade para o 
self-evaluation de encontro aos objetivos do módulo 2, e os 
participants pequenos de um hearing do teste da self-correção nos 
índices do módulo 2, que ele custam? Módulo 2 - Que 
custa? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui sono parzialmente un'occasione per 
self-evaluation contro gli obiettivi del modulo 2 ed i partecipanti 
piccoli di auto-correzione di udienza della prova sul contenuto del 
modulo 2, che cosa esso costa? Modulo 2 - Che cosa costa? 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ είναι εν μέρει μια ευκαιρία για την 
μόνος-αξιολόγηση ενάντια στους στόχους της ενότητας 2, και οι 
συμμετέχοντες λίγης μόνος-διορθώσεων ακρόασης δοκιμής στο 
περιεχόμενο της ενότητας 2, τι αυτό κοστίζουν; Ενότητα 2 - 
τι κοστίζει; Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Aquí están en parte una oportunidad para la 
autoevaluación contra los objetivos del módulo 2, y participantes 
los pequeños de la uno mismo-correccio'n de una audiencia de la 
prueba en el contenido del módulo 2, cuáles él cuesta? 
Módulo 2 - ¿Qué cuesta? Safir.</string>
          </description>
